participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

gdt_scr_parameters_gdtversion.Description: Task version | 1 = original version with feedback (default); 2 = version without feedback

gdt_scr_values_account_balance.Description: Amount participant owns at the end

gdt_scr_values_single.Description: Counts how many times participant has bet on 1 specific dice face

gdt_scr_values_double.Description: Counts how many times participant has bet on 2 specific dice face

gdt_scr_values_triple.Description: Counts how many times participant has bet on 3 specific dice face

gdt_scr_values_quadruple.Description: Counts how many times participant has bet on 4 possible dice faces

gdt_scr_values_safe.Description: Counts how many times participants selected a safe bet (bets on 3 or 4 dice faces)

gdt_scr_values_risky.Description: Counts how many times participants selected a risky bet (bets on 1 or 2 dice faces)

gdt_scr_expressions_net_score.Description: Reflects the number of safe (bets on 3 or 4 numbers) vs. risky (bets on 1 or 2 numbers) choices. It is computed as number of safe bets minus number of risky bets.

gdt_scr_values_wins.Description: Adds the number of winning bets

gdt_scr_values_losses.Description: Adds the number of losing bets

neurocog_2_god___1.Description: Method of GoD administration [Check all that apply]: 1, Audio | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'

neurocog_2_god___2.Description: Method of GoD administration [Check all that apply]:  2, Video/Webcam | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'

neurocog_2_god___3.Description: Method of GoD administration [Check all that apply]: 3, In person (ONLY if issues arise and hybrid) | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'

neurocog_2_god___4.Description: Method of GoD administration [Check all that apply]: 4, Unmonitored | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'
